speaker: Bree
content: Susan, I was just saying Paul wants us to go over on Friday.
mark: go over 通过，穿过;转变，改变;通过，获得认可;被接受，受欢迎;查看，检查

speaker: Bree
content: He needs us to go through Mary Alice's closet and help pack up her things.
mark: help (to) do sth  “帮忙做某事”。这里的 “to” 可以省略

speaker: Bree
content: He said he can't face doing it by himself.
mark: face doing sth 意思是 “面对 / 面临做某事” = be faced with

speaker: Susan
content: If Mary Alice was having problems, she should have come to us. She should've let us help her.
mark: If she was having problems, she should have come to us. if 条件句的虚拟, 假设过去, 从句使用了过去进行时来表示假设，主句用情态动词 should + have done

speaker: Gabrielle
content: What kinds of problems could she have had?
mark: What kinds of problems could she have had  “What kinds of” 表示 “什么样的；哪类；哪些种类的”，后面通常接可数名词的复数形式 have had 现在完成时 have/has done

speaker: Gabrielle
content: She was healthy, had a great home, a nice family, her life was... Our life.

speaker: Gabrielle
content: No. If Mary Alice was having some sort of crisis, we'd have known.
mark: some sort of 某种类型的
crisis 危机，紧要关头；决定性时刻，关键时刻
we'd have known 虚拟语气 We would have known.

speaker: Gabrielle
content: She lives 50 feet away, for God's sake.
mark: for God's sake 看在上帝面上 sake 利益，好处；目的

speaker: Susan
content: Gabby, the woman killed herself. Something must've been going on.
mark: Something must've been going on 一定发生了什么事 going on 进行，发生 what's going on
